pages.text: It gives its fruit at every season by the permission of its Lord - Allah strikes out parables for men that per chance (or possibly) they may reflect (or be mindful)
And the similitude of a bad saying is as a bad tree, which is felled from above the earth, possessing no stability
Allah answers (confirms, establishes) those who believe with the firm (sure) word in the life of this world and in the Hereafter; but Allah leads the wrong-doers astray; for Allah does what He will
Do not you see those who have exchanged AllahÂ´s favours for disbelief, and have led their people to the House of Perdition
Into Hell? They shall broil therein - an ill resting-place
And they made peers for Allah, to lead men astray from His path. Say, "Enjoy yourselves, for, verily, your destination is the Fire

Say to my servants who believe, that they be steadfast in prayer and expend in charity of what We have bestowed upon them, in secret and in public, before there comes the Day when there shall be no bargaining (buying and selling, barter) and no befriendin

Allah it is who created the heavens and the earth; and sent down water from the sky, and brought forth therewith fruits as a provision for you; and subjected to you the ships, to float therein upon the sea at His bidding; and made of service for you the r
And makes the sun and the moon constant in their course, to be of service to you; and made of service for you the night and the day
